item.title: Bank Reviews Intelligence Project
item.description: BankReviewIntelligence is a prototype of a data-as-a-product platform that provides in-depth analytics and decision-making support based on customer reviews of banks. In this project, we set up a pipeline to collect real-time data from Google Maps and build a data warehouse and dashboarding system for decision support. The first version of the project has been released based on scraped data from Morocco, Benin, Senegal, Kenya, Ghana, and Ivory Coast bank customer reviews.

item.title: The Growing Threat of Deepfakes: My personal point of view
item.description: Deepfakes are becoming increasingly sophisticated, presenting new challenges in detecting and combating disinformation. This article explores the current state of deepfake technology, its societal risks, and emerging solutions for mitigating these threats."
